name: Light in the dark (itch) (Tracyn Otterness)
description:
Delve into an ominous cave, grow stronger, and confront the darkness in this action adventure created for Traditional Game Development at the U, Fall 2022

By team Sev-N:

Nick Burum
Andrew Huang
Haotian (Jonathan) Wang
Christian Almond
Aiden Naito
Tracyn Otterness
Ethan Maples
